entry.title: La Belle et La Rose
entry.summary:
Author: Matador

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,532Chapters: 4/15Kudos: 8

Summary: Riquewihr is a strange place, people say. So steep in magic, with a beast as it's Lord... Harley's never paid the rumours any heed. Not when there are for more pressing issues closer to home. That is, until she finds herself volunteering to take her father's place in the belly of the beast: his castle. Beyond haunted, it's everything like the rumours and nothing like them at all. But is there more to the castle and it's terrifying occupant? And what of that rose, locked in the tower, of whom the Beast is most possessive of? (A Beauty & the Beast retelling)

entry.title: I dont wanna fall in love (this world is only gonna break your heart)
entry.summary:
Author: soundsoftheunspoken

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,687Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 51

Summary: Bruce Wayne never believed he was meant to love—not the way normal people do. His life is harsh, unfair, and anyone he lets close is bound to get hurt. Falling in love was never part of the plan; even less now, with a child under his care. But everything shifts when one of the Daily Planet’s best reporters enters his life.Meanwhile, Batman rejects every attempt from Superman to help, keeping him far away from his city. Clark Kent never expected to fall for another vigilante. It’s weirc to love someone whose face he doesn’t even know… and weirder still when that someone seems to despise him Then Batman steps into the picture.And to make things even more complicated, Clark must do his job: interview Gotham’s prince.   or love square type of superbat fic, theyre idiots, superman loves batman, and bruce wayne loves clark kent

entry.title: a second skin
entry.summary:
Author: ewwitsepf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,431Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Bruce Wayne: full-time CEO, hacker, father. He spends his days - and nights - protecting his life, livelihood, and family from extortion and other dangers. And there’s somebody out there kidnapping civilians off the street. Not just in Gotham, but in Metropolis too. Now Bruce has to save the two cities and stop the plan before everything goes up in flames. Unfortunately he's just become a seal babysitter. Make that four full-time jobs. --- In the background a sound that was not quite normal for the beach was starting to grow louder with every step he made. It was a rhythmic thumping sound. As if someone was slapping an item made of rubber repeatedly against the ground. Bruce was too engrossed in the music to pay attention however. He had just made it to the second tempo change when the sound from the outside world finally caught his attention. There on his beach, in his cove was a ginormous seal, flopping back and forth in what could only be described as “pacing.” Bruce froze, “Well damn.”

entry.title: Glitter Bat
entry.summary:
Author: DragonViper

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 770Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Bruce’s anonymity is of the utmost importance tonight. Even more so than usual. If he is discovered as either Batman or his public persona the mission will fail. He takes a moment to scrutinize his appearance reflecting back in the full length mirror. He’s wearing high heeled boots, dark leather pants, and a black turtle neck tank, which conceals the majority of his old wounds. However, the scar tissue that is exposed contorts around his forearms like swirling stripes. He opted to coat them in silvery-blue body paint to give off the allusion of intentional patterning. Midnight blue face paint, speckled with the same glitter, mimics the shape of a domino mask. His metallic blue eyes are exposed, and his recordable contact lenses are practically invisible. Overall, the outfit is passable.

entry.title: Miss the Mark
entry.summary:
Author: elihinata

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,933Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 354

Summary: Clark Kent has never shaken the feeling that he doesn’t quite belong. He grew up learning to hide—his strength, his heritage, his very self—all to protect a secret that kept him at arm’s length from everyone around him. And yet, nothing made him feel more alone than discovering the one thing his Kryptonian biology denied him: a soulmate. While every human carried a mark guiding them to someone meant just for them, Clark carried nothing. No promise. No destined other. The more time passes, the heavier that truth becomes, aching under his skin until it finally breaks him. One night, overwhelmed by longing and starved for a connection he fears he’ll never have, Clark gives in to a single reckless impulse. He kisses the one person he trusts most in this world—his best friend, Bruce Wayne.

Summary: Sequel to A LILAC LOVE Bruce and Clark are officially engaged, and the Waynes are wasting no time planning for the big day. That is, until they're paid a visit by Talia al Ghul, who intends to sway Damian back into the League of Assassins under the orders of his grandfather. Things are made even more complicated when a certain chain-smoking, cockney wizard shows up at the manor with terrible news. As it turns out, experimenting with Brainiac's aether without a failsafe can come with some unpredictable results.

entry.title: Slow Dance
entry.summary:
Author: capricious_Bastard

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,389Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 16

Summary: There's a soft sound drifting through the calm breeze. He takes his gloves off, wipes away any dirt on his arms and jogs up to the front of the farm where he almost loses his footing as he meets with a cow. Barely dressed in Spring weather, tits hefty with thick milk leaking out. The cow's only got on a pair of tights, a pair of dirty, dusty flat shoes and not much else. "Hey, girl," he calls out, just as softly. The cow lifts his head up, ears laid flat, practically hidden underneath black-brown strands, his tail swishes anxiously as he crosses his arms firmly over his chest, wincing when all it causes is clear ache from not being milked.

Summary: “Don’t.”Clark says, fixing his glasses. Oh. That grabbed Bruce's full attention right away.He didn't expect to hear Clark's deep, serious voice from that polite and soft reporter boy.And he was stronger than he expected.Bruce let out a chuckle, surprised, amused, and turned on."Ohh...someone's got some bite to 'em."Clark knew he could easily overpower Bruce, he could have Bruce under him if he wanted
